title: IGT's Wheel of Fortune® Slots Enrich Jackpot Legacy With $1 Million Dollar-Plus Payout at Four Winds New Buffalo
content:
LONDON , Sept. 23, 2015  /satPRnews.com/ — International Game Technology PLC (“IGT”) (NYSE: IGT ) Wheel of Fortune slots propelled its millionaire-minting streak after awarding a lucky player with a life-changing $1,225,317 jackpot on Wheel of Fortune Pink Diamond ® at Four Winds New Buffalo ®  in New Buffalo, Mich. , on Sept. 14, 2015 . The winner wished to remain anonymous. 
 
No one pays jackpots like IGT . IGT launched Wheel of Fortune slots in 1996 and solidified the Company’s leadership in Wide Area Progressive technology. Known as the most successful slot title of all-time, the fan-favorite theme has minted nearly 1,000 millionaires and delivered over $3 billion in jackpots throughout its illustrious history. IGT has created more than 200 variations of the game that can be found on casino floors in more than 20 countries worldwide.
